WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing old Fixed defects.... Esp. since there's been quite a few builds since these were marked fixed.  Any new instances of those issues should be created in new defects.
WorkItem.Description: Right click - Open in wowhead on an enchant doesn't link to the correct page (in fact, This item doesn't exist or is not yet in the database.)

Comments.Message: This appears to have been addressed in version 2.1.5. You can no longer right click an enchant in the comparison window.
It's in the popup form for choosing an enchant, you still can. We still need to fix that.
I spoke too soon the other day. I see the pop-up window that was allowing the right-click context menu for enchants. This has been addressed in Change Set 30095.
